verses.verse: <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H7462>feeds<s%> on <S%H7307>wind<s%>, and <S%H7291>follows<s%> after the east <S%H6921>wind<s%>: he <S%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H7235>increases<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%> and <S%H7701>desolation<s%>; and they do <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with the <S%H804>Assyrians<s%>, and <S%H8081>oil<s%> is <S%H2986>carried<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has also a <S%H7379>controversy<s%> with <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and will <S%H6485>punish<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> according to his <S%H1870>ways<s%>; according to his <S%H4611>doings<s%> will he recompense <S%H7725>him<s%>.
He took his <S%H251>brother<s%> by the <S%H6117>heel<s%> in the <S%H990>womb<s%>, and by his <S%H202>strength<s%> he had <S%H8280>power<s%> with <S%H430>God<s%>:

<S%H7786>Yes<s%>, he had power over the <S%H4397>angel<s%>, and <S%H3201>prevailed<s%>: he <S%H1058>wept<s%>, and made <S%H2603>supplication<s%> unto <S%H4672>him<s%>: he found him in <S%H1008>Beth<s%>â€“el, and there he spoke with <S%H1696>us<s%>;
Even the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>; the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is his <S%H2143>memorial<s%>.
Therefore <S%H7725>turn<s%> you to your <S%H430>God<s%>: <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, and <S%H6960>wait<s%> on your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>.
He is a <S%H3667>merchant<s%>, the <S%H3976>balances<s%> of <S%H4820>deceit<s%> are in his <S%H3027>hand<s%>: he <S%H157>loves<s%> to <S%H6231>oppress<s%>.

And <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Yet I am become <S%H6238>rich<s%>, I have found me <S%H4672>out<s%> <S%H202>substance<s%>: in all my <S%H3018>labors<s%> they shall <S%H4672>find<s%> none <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> in me that were <S%H2399>sin<s%>.

And I that am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> will yet make you to <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H168>tabernacles<s%>, as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the solemn <S%H4150>feast<s%>.

I have also <S%H1696>spoken<s%> by the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, and I have <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> <S%H2377>visions<s%>, and used <S%H1819>similitudes<s%>, by the <S%H3027>ministry<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>.

Is there <S%H205>iniquity<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>? surely they are <S%H7723>vanity<s%>: they <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H7794>bullocks<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>; <S%H4196>Yes<s%>, their altars are as <S%H1530>heaps<s%> in the <S%H8525>furrows<s%> of the <S%H7704>fields<s%>.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H1272>fled<s%> into the <S%H7704>country<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%>, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> for a <S%H802>wife<s%>, and for a <S%H802>wife<s%> he kept <S%H8104>sheep<s%>.
And by a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5927>brought<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and by a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> was he <S%H8104>preserved<s%>.

<S%H669>Ephraim<s%> provoked him to <S%H3707>anger<s%> most <S%H8563>bitterly<s%>: therefore shall he <S%H5203>leave<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon <S%H2781>him<s%>, and his reproach shall his <S%H113>Lord<s%> return unto <S%H7725>him<s%>.
